title: Fingerprint hardware not available
content:
I've been using the pixel 4a for like 7 months now it's an amazing phone I'm totally satisfied but I've been having the problem of pinger print sensor I don't know what's wrong it says fingerprint hardware not available and it's really annoying I have to unlock the phone manually every time I use it. 
I am located in Nepal but I brought this phone from India. It'd be really amazing if you could help me here.
